showOnCursorMove.title: Show on Cursor Move
showOnCursorMove.description: When enabled, the hover overlay will appear when your cursor rests on a symbol. When disabled, the hover overlay wonâ€™t appear for the token under the cursor until you invoke the **Pulsar Hover: Toggle** command.

showOnMouseMove.title: Show on Mouse Move
showOnMouseMove.description: When enabled, the hover overlay will appear when the mouse pointer rests on a symbol.

hoverTime.title: Hover Delay Time
hoverTime.description: How long (in milliseconds) to wait before asking for hover information on mouse or cursor rest; also how long for the hover overlay to linger after mouse or cursor movement.

showOverlayWhileTyping.title: Show While Typing
showOverlayWhileTyping.description: Whether to display signature help while the user types function parameters.

includeSignatureDocumentation.title: Include Signature Documentation
includeSignatureDocumentation.description: Whether the signature help overlay should include the documentation for the entire signature. If disabled, only the documentation for the active parameter will be shown.
